mapper.select: select m.id as msgId, m.operate_user_id as operateUserId, u.user_name as operateUserName, u.photo as operateUserPhoto, m.msg as msg, m.type as type, m.state as state, m.related_id as relatedId, a.title as relatedInfo, m.create_time as createTime from notify_msg as m left join user_info as u on m.operate_user_id = u.user_id left join article as a on m.related_id = a.id where m.notify_user_id = #{userId} and m.type = #{type} order by m.create_time desc
